name: Ni WooCommerce Dashboard Sales Report
author: anzia

sections.description:
Are you looking to boost your WooCommerce store’s sales and gain valuable insights into your business performance? Look no further than the Ni WooCommerce Dashboard Report plugin. With its powerful features and user-friendly interface, this plugin is designed to provide you with comprehensive sales analysis and reporting.

Track your sales and monitor key metrics effortlessly with the Ni WooCommerce Dashboard Report plugin. Gain a deeper understanding of your customers’ behavior, identify trends, and make informed decisions to optimize your online store for success.

This plugin offers an intuitive dashboard that displays crucial information such as total sales, order counts, top-selling products, and revenue trends. With visually appealing charts and graphs, you can easily analyze your sales data and identify areas for improvement.

Stay informed with regular email reports that provide a summary of your sales performance. Receive valuable insights on order status, payment gateway sales, and top-performing products, all delivered directly to your inbox.

With the Ni WooCommerce Dashboard Report plugin, you can take your WooCommerce store to new heights. Download the plugin now and unlock the power of data-driven decision-making for your online business.

Don’t miss out on the opportunity to optimize your WooCommerce store for success. Install the Ni WooCommerce Dashboard Report plugin today and gain the competitive edge you need to thrive in the e-commerce landscape.

Would you like to check our pro version?

  • View Demo
  • Buy Now

Key Features of Ni WooCommerce Dashboard Sales Report

  • Display sales report on WordPress admin dashboard
  • Show five recent order with details information like order ID, Order Status, order total and etc
  • Show the all summary of all order status with order status count and order total
  • Ni WooCommerce Sales By Month Report show the total gross sales and total net sales of last 6 month
  • Show sales order count and value for Today, Yesterday, This Week, This Month and This Year.
  • Show new customer report Today, Yesterday, This Week, This Month and This Year.
  • Display top 10 sold product quantity

Pro version feature

  • Dashboard order summary
  • Order List
  • Order Details
  • Order Status wise sales report
  • Customer wise sales report
  • Payment Gateway wise sales report
  • Country wise sales report
  • Coupon wise sales report
  • Product wise sales report
  • Filter all report with date range, customer name, billing name, emaill address, order status and many more
  • CSV/Excel export

Note: This plugin is fully compatible with both WooCommerce’s new High-Performance Order Storage (HPOS) and the legacy WordPress posts storage. Whether you are utilizing HPOS or the traditional storage method, you can rely on this plugin to work seamlessly with your current setup.

Support/Feedback Email/New Report Requirement

  • We are open to your suggestions and feedback – Thank you for using or trying out one of our plugins
  • support@naziinfotech.com

Feedback
* We are open to your suggestions and feedback – Thank you for using or trying out one of our plugins.

Support email: support@naziinfotech.com

Disclaimer

It is not responsible for any harm or wrong doing this Plugin may cause. Users are fully responsible for their own use. This Plugin is to be used WITHOUT warranty.
sections.installation:
1. Use the WordPress plugin installer or upload files to WordPress plugin directory.
  2. Activate “Ni WooCommerce Dashboard Sales Report” plugin from admin panel.
  3. Go to wordpress dashboard end find Ni WooCommerce Sales Order Status and Ni WooCommerce Recent Order.
sections.faq:
Where i can get help?

Click on support tab or email :support@naziinfotech.com

Do you customize this plugin?

Yes, as per requirement we can customize this plugin.
